title: Shattered Reflections
goal: Kaelen's memories become more vivid, revealing a past failure or a powerful adversary.

beats.summary: The exertion of magic triggers a flood of more coherent memories for Kaelen, showing him glimpses of a powerful, ancient entity he once knew or fought.
He sees images of a devastating past event, hinting at his own involvement or a critical failure to contain the threat.
Kaelen grapples with guilt and confusion as the true scope of his forgotten past begins to emerge.
